quotes.quote: Individuality is only possible if it unfolds from wholeness.
No one should part with their individuality and become that of another.
I believe in individuality, that everybody is special, and it's up to them to find that quality and let it live.
The best thing you've got going for you is individuality.
You know, our sense of individuality is just the number one target of civilization.
Don't ask what the world needs. Ask what makes you come alive, and go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
You just have to do your own thing, no matter what anyone says. It's your life.
Let every man judge according to his own standards, by what he has himself read, not by what others tell him.
The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are.
Losing faith in your own singularity is the start of wisdom, I suppose; also the first announcement of death.
To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best day and night to make you everybody else means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight, and never stop fighting.
Follow your own star!
Do not wish to be anything but what you are, and try to be that perfectly.
The best things and best people rise out of their separateness; I'm against a homogenized society because I want the cream to rise.
What distinguishes the majority of men from the few is their ability to act according to their beliefs.
Never follow the crowd.
My great mistake, the fault for which I can't forgive myself, is that one day I ceased my obstinate pursuit of my own individuality.
Each man must grant himself the emotions that he needs and the morality that suits him.

Individuality is the aim of political liberty. By leaving to the citizen as much freedom of action and of being, as comports with order and the rights of others, the institutions render him truly a freeman. He is left to pursue his means of happiness in h
The shoe that fits one person pinches another; there is no recipe for living that suits all cases.
You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist.
Each man must have his I; it is more necessary to him than bread; and if he does not find scope for it within the existing institutions he will be likely to make trouble.
No one can transcend their own individuality.
Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Do not desire to fit in. Desire to lead.
Individuality is freedom lived.
You have to work at creating your own culture.
Every artist dips his brush in his own soul, and paints his own nature into his pictures.
Few are those who see with their own eyes and feel with their own hearts.
It is the chiefest point of happiness that a man is willing to be what he is.
Some people say you are going the wrong way, when it's simply a way of your own.
Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
It were not best that we should all think alike; it is difference of opinion that makes horse races.
All lies and jests, still a man hears what he wants to hear and disregards the rest.
All progress has resulted from people who took unpopular positions.
Everybody's business is nobody's business, and nobody's business is my business.
Individuality realized is the supreme attainment of the human soul, the master-master's work of art. Individuality is sacred.
Every man has a property in his own person. This nobody has a right to, but himself.
There is just one life for each of us: our own.
We are all unique and all have a unique world view and definition of reality.
Some of the most wonderful people are the ones who don't fit into boxes.
Be different, stand out, and work your butt off.
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
No one can possibly achieve any real and lasting success or 'get rich' in business by being a conformist.
No one else but you can make your marks. Listen to your bones. Speak with your spirit. Edit with your head. Live with your heart.
Don't compare. You paint differently because you are different.
I'm my own writer. My material means I'm entirely separate.
The wonderful thing about looking at the real world is that it is never the same for each individual.
We all boil at different degrees.
I'm not in this world to live up to your expectations and you're not in this world to live up to mine.
